last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: The police make an arrest, but it isn't of Makiko. Anzu and Yuzu pay a visit to the Mitarai house to find out the whole truth.

name: Burn the House Down
overview: After her mother took the blame for a tragic fire 13 years ago, Anzu plots revenge by working as a housekeeper under a pseudonym for her icy stepmother.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A young woman calling herself Shizuka Yamauchi arrives at the Mitarai house as the new housekeeper; it's a home she once knew very well.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Yuzu figures out a way to get more information out of the Mitarai family. Makiko begins to share her less-than-glamorous past with the public.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Shinji offers to set up a meeting between Yuzu and their father. Kiichi blackmails Anzu, keeping her from making any progress in her investigation.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Claire finds what may be Makiko's personal blog from 14 years ago. Shinji starts to suspect that Shizuka Yamauchi may not be who she says she is.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After a setback, Anzu has to recalibrate. She confronts her father, and gains an unlikely ally. Anzu finds a new way to keep a close eye on Makiko.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Makiko goes viral all over social media — and not for a good reason. Then, someone starts posting stories exposing Makiko's past.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Instead of apologizing, Makiko holds a press conference and declares that she'll continue being Makiko Mitarai. But the choice may not be her's to make.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The police make an arrest, but it isn't of Makiko. Anzu and Yuzu pay a visit to the Mitarai house to find out the whole truth.
